summary: Gandalf and Aragorn unite the forces of Men to distract Sauron while Frodo and Sam undertake their perilous journey to destroy the One Ring.
Two imprisoned men develop a deep friendship and find hope and redemption through their shared experiences.
An aging crime lord hands over his empire to his hesitant son amidst family and criminal challenges.
Batman faces a formidable challenge as the Joker unleashes chaos in Gotham, testing his resolve to fight injustice.
The film explores Vito Corleone's rise in the 1920s New York crime scene and his son Michael's consolidation of power within the family syndicate.
